author: Sarah R
title: Wonderful stay - trendy & comfy
text: Stayed in Gild Hall for one night with my boyfriend. When the hotel knew it was our anniversary they upgraded us and gave us some free champagne - incredibly generous. Our room was so nice and the bed was HUGE - probably the biggest bed I've stayed in, in New York. Great decor, very modern and the food we ordered from the restaurant was great, all be it, a little pricey. Great value for a wonderful room in an underrated area of Manhattan. Would stay again and recommend to friends!
